channel.title: No-ip DUC; Does it really work?
channel.description: does no-ip DUC really work? and if it does do you go to options>connections> and click override automatic IP detection and select the hamachi one in the drop-down box then use that as your IP?

item.title: No-ip DUC; Does it really work?
item.dc:creator: @dragonblood_dan dragonblood_dan
item.description:
@dragonblood_dan wrote:

u need to forward your ports and possibley turn off your firewall, go to portforward.com, find you modem/router there and follow any tutorial but forward your server port, not the port they tell you

Read full topic
item.source: No-ip DUC; Does it really work?
